mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, node_code, node_name, parent_id, picture_code, method_name, type, memo,funstyle
mapper.select: SELECT *,(case when subnums>0 and subvalidnums>0 and subnums-subvalidnums>0 then 'half' when subnums>0 and subvalidnums>0 and subnums-subvalidnums=0 then 'all' when subnums=0 and selfvalidnums>0 then 'all' else '' end) as setstyle FROM ( SELECT nodeinfo.id,nodeinfo.id AS node_id,nodeinfo.node_code+0 as node_code,nodeinfo.node_name,nodeinfo.parent_id, ifnull(pnode.node_code,0)+0 AS node_pcode,nodeinfo.memo,nodeinfo.type, (SELECT group_concat('[',nn.id,']' order by nn.node_code separator '') FROM node_info nn WHERE nn.parent_id=nodeinfo.id) sublist, (SELECT count(*) FROM node_info nodeinfo1 WHERE nodeinfo1.parent_id = nodeinfo.id) AS subnums, (select COUNT(*) from role_node_permission rnp where rnp.node_id in (select n.id from node_info n where n.parent_id=nodeinfo.id ) and rnp.role_id = #{roleId}) as subvalidnums, (select count(*) from role_node_permission as rolenodeper1 where rolenodeper1.node_id=nodeinfo.id and rolenodeper1.role_id=#{roleId}) as selfvalidnums FROM node_info AS nodeinfo LEFT JOIN node_info AS pnode ON nodeinfo.parent_id = pnode.id left join role_info as role on role.id = #{roleId} WHERE nodeinfo.type=role.type ) as tempa ORDER BY node_pcode, node_code

select id,
from node_info order by node_code

SELECT n.id as 'id', n.node_name as 'nodeName', n.method_name as 'methodName', n.type as 'type', n.funstyle as 'funstyle', n.node_code as 'nodeCode', m.node_name as 'parentName' FROM `node_info` AS n LEFT JOIN `node_info` AS m on n.parent_id = m.id
n.node_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{nodeInfo.nodeName}),'%')
AND n.type = #{nodeInfo.type}
AND n.parent_id != 0
order by n.node_code

SELECT n.id as 'id', n.node_name as 'nodeName', m.node_name as 'parentName', m.id as 'parentId', n.picture_code as 'pictureCode', n.method_name as 'methodName', n.memo as 'memo', n.type as 'type', n.node_code as 'nodeCode', n.funstyle as 'funstyle'
FROM `node_info` AS n LEFT JOIN `node_info` AS m on n.parent_id = m.id where n.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into node_info
id,
create_by,
create_time,
update_by,
update_time,
node_code,
node_name,
parent_id,
picture_code,
method_name,
type,
memo,
funstyle,

#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update node_info
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
node_code = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
picture_code = #{pictureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
funstyle = #{funstyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update node_info set create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, node_code = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, picture_code = #{pictureCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, funstyle = #{funstyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
